register.title: Register trialaccount
register.description: You can use Your Vinou® trial account 1 months for free including all features of the Vinou® platform. After the 1 months trial phase you can choose using Vinou® further or your account will be deleted automatically. You’ll be reminded via email and can choose wisely.
register.send: Congratulations your account was created. Within the next minutes you'll receive an email to activate your user and set a password.

verify.title: Send verification
verify.contact:
Get in contact with us:
kontakt@vinou.de · +49(0) 6131 62 45 390

success.common: We send a verifcation letter containing an activation link to {customer.name}, {customer.company}, {customer.address}, {customer.zip} {customer.city}. After activation you're able to use all of our network functions for free for 30 days.
success.reinvite: An invitation has been sent to {customer.mail}. Use the link in the mail to get verified.

error.common:
Oops, an error occured. The verification could not be sent.

Please contact us to start networking as soon as possible.
error.completed:
You are already verified. A letter with an activation link is sent to you by mail to address: {customer.name}, {customer.company}, {customer.address}, {customer.zip} {customer.city}. After successfully activation you are welcome to test the full functionallity of our network for a trial of 30 days.

If you did not receive a postcard from us, please feel free to contact us, to get started immediately.
error.expired:
Oops, an error occured. The verification could not be sent. Invitation term is expired.

Please contact us to start networking as soon as possible. Use contact:
kontakt@vinou.de · +49(0) 6131 62 45 390

activate.title: Finish verification
activate.description: Only one step until your personal membership. Please insert name, e-mail and password to create an administrator user for your Vinou-Account.
activate.error:
The verification could not be finished. Please try again or get in contact with us to get started immediately.

Contact us:
kontakt@vinou.de · +49(0) 6131 62 45 390

upgrade.title: Upgrade Membership
upgrade.description: Being a Vinou-Complete member you can use all features by paying a monthly fee of 40 EUR excluding VAT. Each negotiated order generates a promotion fee of 1 EUR excluding VAT. The monthly fee will be invoiced every month in advance. The promotion fee will be invoiced at 1st of following month

teaser.publish: You are using Vinou-Promo. To activate the full featured Version please upgrade to Vinou-Complete.
teaser.trial: You are using Vinou within the trial phase. To continously using all features please upgrade to Vinou-Complete.

upgrade.bank: Bancaccount for SEPA direct debit mandate

fields.name: Contact person
fields.cop: I've read the conditions of purchase and agree
fields.trust: I accept that my account will be deleted if my usage doesn't fit to the conditions of use or the customers credentials aren't real
fields.payment: I accept that Vinou will debit the monthly fee with added value tax and the placements fee for each external orders from the given account.

covid19Notification.title: Am 31. Dezember endet die MwSt.-Senkung!
covid19Notification.text: Hast Du bis dahin keine Auswahl zur MwSt.-Rückstellung vorgenommen, stellen wir Deine Preise automatisch zu diesem Datum um. Als Grundlage verwenden wir hierfür Deine Bruttopreise bzw. Deine bestehende Einstellung zur MwSt.-Senkung.
covid19Notification.footerText: Weitere Informationen zur Mehrwertsteuersenkung

appSlitNotification.title: Achtung!!! Abschaltung app.vinou.de zum 23.08.2021.
appSlitNotification.text: Du nutzt die Internetadresse app.vinou.de um Vinou-Office zu erreichen. Diese Domain wird zum 23.08.2021 abgeschaltet! Du erreichst Vinou-Office ab sofort unter https://office.vinou.de und Vinou-Cellar unter https://cellar.vinou.de.

dialog.smallBusiness:
Do you really want to change the small business setting?
All prices of your wines, products and shipment options will get adjusted and must be verified.

toasts.upgrade_error: An error occured. Vinou-Complete wasn't activated!
toasts.activation_error: An error occured. Account could not be activated!

covid19TaxrateReset.title: Ablauf der befristeten Mehrwertsteuersenkung
covid19TaxrateReset.text: Bitte nimm Dir kurz Zeit und gib an, wie Du Deine Preise aufgrund der MwSt.-Rückstellung anpassen möchtest. Welchen Preis möchtest Du beibehalten und für die Neuberechnung als Basis benutzen?
covid19TaxrateReset.footerText:
Solltest Du Fragen dazu haben, wende dich direkt an uns:
E-Mail: kontakt@vinou.de, Tel: +49 6131 6245390

account.title: Account settings
account.description: Administrate your invoice address, membership, bank account etc.

automations.title: Automations
automations.description: With the help of automation you can enable other Vinou members to do certain things fully automatically with you, e.g. activate wines from wineries on your website.

customer.title: Invoice information
customer.description: Administrate your Vinou membership settings. These information are not public and won’t be shown in the Vinou network.

mail.title: E-Mail setup
mail.description: The Vinou-Network and also your webshop are sending automated mail notifications. To use this you need to configure an SMTP-Mailbox.

membership.title: Membership
membership.description: Check and manage the current status of your membership.

merchants.title: My wine store
merchants.description: Define additional companies for your wine store. These information are public and will be shown within the Vinou network.

wineries.title: My winery
wineries.description: Define additiona wineries to sell your wines for example as winery or as bottler. These are public informations shown within the Vinou network.

network.title: My Network
network.description: Define, how you would like to use the Vinou network.

orderForwarding.title: Order forwarding
orderForwarding.description: Activate order forwarding for connected articles from Vinou network and automatically create orders at your connected wineries.
orderForwarding.hint: After activation, order forwarding must also be activated for each wine.

packagings.title: Package options
packagings.description: Configure your package options regarding count of bottles or weight of an order. This is really important to use your webshop.

packagingunits.title: Packaging units
packagingunits.description: Configure your shipment boxes. These settings will also be used to calculate shipment label.

payments.title: Payment methods
payments.description: With different payment methods you're able to make your webshop more attractive to your clients.

stripe.name: Stripe
stripe.title: Payment processing by Stripe
stripe.description: You have successfully registered to use Stripe as a payment service provider for credit and debit card payments as well as for SEPA direct debits. The resulting additional fees of 2.4% of the order value plus a service flat rate of 0.25 EUR per order are automatically deducted from each order.

deactivate.title: Deactivate payment processing by Stripe
deactivate.description: If you no longer want to use Stripe to process payments, please click here.

actions.login: Here you get to the configuration of your Stripe account.

activate.title: Activate payment processing through Stripe
activate.text:
For credit and debit card payments as well as for SEPA direct debits, the Vinou ordering system uses the provider Stripe, for which additional fees of 2.4% of the order value plus a service flat rate of 0.25 EUR per order will be charged.

By clicking on Yes you confirm the current Conditions of payment processing and you will be forwarded to Stripe for setup. The use of Vinou payment processing via Stripe can be deactivated at any time via the payment methods.

dialogs.deactivate: Are you sure you want to deactivate payment processing through Stripe?

toasts.deactivated: Payment processing through Stripe successfully deactivated!

errors.deactivationNotPossible: Currently payment processing through Stripe cannot be deactivated. Please check whether your Stripe account's balances are zero and whether there are any outstanding payments.

priceranges.title: Price ranges
priceranges.description: Configure your price ranges to setup individual client prices.

shipment.title: Shipment settings
shipment.description: Set your freight free limit and whether you want to use the Vinou shipment management.

freightfreelimit.title: Freight free limit
freightfreelimit.description: Configure order total from when packaging is free of charge.

management.title: Shipment management
management.inactive: Activate shipment management service by Vinou and shipcloud to generate shipment labels directly by using the Vinou WebApplication
management.description: Configure shipment e.g. to select a default shipment carrier.

technical.title: Technology
technical.description: For some aspects you need to configure some technical stuff. This is the place to do that.

templates.title: Templates
templates.description: In Vinou you are able to change all PDF-Documents by creating your own templates.

texts.title: Texts
texts.description: Create texts to provide information such as imprint, data protection agreement, cancellation form or terms and conditions. You can easily format your texts here. These texts, including the formatting, can be used in your own online shop, among other things.

toasts.settings_cashlink_registererror: Registration failed, did you use the false mail address!
toasts.wine_image_needed: You need to save the wine before uploading an image!
